name: Wrist Support w/strap
descr:
As a wrist support designed specifically for active use, the Chiroform Wrist Support is the ideal solution for work, leisure and sports. Suitable for all-day and long-term use. With a supporting compression strap and individually adjustable velcro closure. Integrated padding for additional comfort. Hand washing recommended. May be used for right and left hand.

One size fits all.
